name: ragel
description:
Ragel State Machine Compiler Ragel compiles executable finite state
machines from regular languages. Ragel targets C, C++ and ASM. Ragel
state machines can not only recognize byte sequences as regular
expression machines do, but can also execute code at arbitrary points in
the recognition of a regular language. Code embedding is done using
inline operators that do not disrupt the regular language syntax.

dependencies.name: colm
dependencies.description:
Colm Programming Language Colm is a programming language designed for
the analysis and transformation of computer languages. Colm is
influenced primarily by TXL. It is in the family of program
transformation languages.
